HOME_HERO.MOTTO_FIRST_PART: Saint John The Merciful Center for
HOME_HERO.DESCRIPTION: In those moments when you are down, in need of support, how much the help offered with love, from the heart, from belief matters. We fully hope and I firmly believe that the team of Saint John the Merciful Center will strive to bring comfort, healing, and to be a support to those who have no one else to rely on.

DONATION_PROGRESS.TITLE: Progress
DONATION_PROGRESS.DESCRIPTION: The necessary amount to complete the project and the amount raised so far. Every donation counts!

SAINT_JOHN.TITLE: Saint John The Merciful Center
SAINT_JOHN.DESCRIPTION: Together we save lives, change destinies, heal souls. Each of us has gone through a dark period at least once in our life from which we no longer knew how to get out or when it would end. We saw our family, friends, loved ones in our lives suffering and we had no way to help them. How much help is given with empathy, with affection and love. In those moments you need support and I strongly believe that the team of the St. John The Merciful Center will strive to bring relief, healing and be a support to those who will tell us, help us.
SAINT_JOHN.IMAGE_ALT: Icon of Saint John the Merciful Center

HOME_POTENTIAL.TITLE: Children's potential
HOME_POTENTIAL.DESCRIPTION: Your donation to our cause can create a brighter future, providing essential education, health, and nourishment to children in need. Each contribution brings hope and opens doors to a universe of possibilities. Let's build a brighter future together. Donate now and make a difference! Your support is vital in our mission to unlock a child's potential. With every donation, we can offer more than just basic needs; we provide a foundation for lifelong learning and growth. Our programs focus on education, healthcare, and empowering communities to uplift their youngest members.

HOME_HELP.DESCRIPTION: There are many ways you can help, not only by donating. Every gesture matters. Here are a few of the ways you contribute.

FIRST.TITLE: Material goods
FIRST.DESCRIPTION: Donate clothes, toys, books, furniture, hygiene items, or other material goods that you no longer use.

THIRD.TITLE: Volunteering
THIRD.DESCRIPTION: We are always looking for volunteers to help us. We'll help you find a way to volunteer that best suits you.

HOME_BLOG.TITLE: Blog
HOME_BLOG.DESCRIPTION: Here you can find some articles about various topics. We hope you will find them interesting and useful.

OUR_TEAM.TITLE: Our Team
OUR_TEAM.DESCRIPTION: Meet our team! We are passionate people when it comes to our work and we wish to bring a positive impact in the world.

ABOUT.TITLE: About us
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION: Who we are, what we do, and why we do it.

WHO_ARE_WE.TITLE: Who are we?
WHO_ARE_WE.DESCRIPTION: We are volunteers who, after several years of humanitarian activities, founded the Bucurie în Dar (Gift of Joy) Association to help on a larger scale. We are people who live for others, not just for ourselves. With the help of The Good Lord and with your support, in a joint work, we want to bring joy to the hearts of many people, big and small, young and old. We have the freedom to choose what we do in this life, and we chose to help, and we do it with all the joy and love. Give joy too, together with us.

WHAT_WE_DO.TITLE: What we do
WHAT_WE_DO.DESCRIPTION: We listen to the life stories of those who are less important to a part of society. We are support, with everything in our power, for those who have no one left to lean on. We help those who shout: help us! Choose to help with us! It's that simple. Just choose.

WHY_WE_HELP.TITLE: Why we help
WHY_WE_HELP.DESCRIPTION: Because we have the power to choose what we do with our time, with our lives. The legacy we leave to our children are our deeds, which they also pass on. Dear people, from this life, we only leave with our deeds. You who come and help, sacrifice your time, your comfort and your money for people you don't know. You chose to give your life to your neighbor. This is the gift and it comes from love.

CONTACT.DESCRIPTION: Contact us for any questions or suggestions.
